article_node.title: Instant Payments and Mobile Commerce Drive Banking’s Q4 Agenda
article_node.summary: Banks and credit unions are prioritizing instant payments, mobile commerce, and AI-driven risk controls as they navigate inflation, rate swings, and consumer demand for speed and convenience. Real‑time rails like FedNow and RTP are expanding, with consumers willing to pay premiums for instant access, while fraud fears are being challenged by data showing lower fraud rates on real‑time payments. Digital onboarding, mobile card issuance, and conversational AI are becoming core competitive differentiators, driving banks to invest heavily in technology and multi‑rail strategies to meet evolving customer expectations.
